entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, mentioned as saying 'Thanks for the fudge and the jumper, Mrs Weasley.'

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a kind person who gave Harry fudge and a jumper.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle, described as 'still purple-faced, still moustached, still looking furious'.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt, mentioned as standing behind Uncle Vernon and looking terrified at the sight of Harry.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin, described as 'looking terrified' along with Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's, mentioned in the last paragraph.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's, also mentioned in the last paragraph.

relationships.description: Mrs Weasley gave Harry fudge and a jumper.
Uncle Vernon is disapproving of Harry's behavior, described as 'looking furious'.
Aunt Petunia and Dudley are fearful of Harry.
Aunt Petunia and Dudley are fearful of Harry.
Ron is a friend of Harry's, mentioned in the last paragraph.
Hermione is another friend of Harry's, also mentioned in the last paragraph.
Harry plans to have fun with Dudley this summer.
